name: Sheep N Sleep
description:
This is my entry for the 2019 UE4 Summer Jam !

Sheep N Sleep is about count sheep to fall Asleep. In each level you will try to sleep in a different environment
(your dream world is the same through all levels but the ambient sound is different). 

Sheep N Sleep Controls

W, A, S, D  Moves the character
Mouse controls the First Person Camera 
Left Mouse Click is the interaction button
Escape opens the pause menu
